channel.title: How to make a basic donar command
channel.description:
DISCLAIMER================================================================================= Don't say this is common sense or stupid, after surfing the forum for an hour i found that many people dont know how to do this. ========================================================================================== Difficulty:[b]1/10[/b] [b]What you need to use/know[/b] Basic copy and paste java ======================================================================================== This is a simple command i have pulled from my server, it teleports you to dzone. if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME LIKE ANY OTHER COMMAND") && donator == 1) { triggerTele(coor, coor, 0);
Copy and paste this under your commands, then just change the name like any other command and add coords. the most important part is the [b]donator == 1)[/b] without this (common sense) any one will be able to tele there, make sure it is donator ==1 not donator == 0 or "anyone" could tele there. if you would like to turn this into a mod+ command just change donator to player rights == 1 or player rights == 2 or for owner player rights == 3

item.title: How to make a basic donar command
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Your code contains errors and this is just copy and pasting an if-statement. Your conventions are also horrible.
http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/if.html

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a basic donar command

item.title: How to make a basic donar command
item.dc:creator: @john55223 john55223
item.description:
@john55223 wrote:

DISCLAIMER=================================================================================
Don’t say this is common sense or stupid, after surfing the forum for an hour i found that many people dont know how to do this.

Difficulty:1/10
What you need to use/know
Basic copy and paste
java

This is a simple command i have pulled from my server, it teleports you to dzone.
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAME LIKE ANY OTHER COMMAND”) && donator == 1) {
triggerTele(coor, coor, 0);

Copy and paste this under your commands, then just change the name like any other command and add coords.
the most important part is the donator == 1) without this (common sense) any one will be able to tele there, make sure it is donator ==1 not donator == 0 or “anyone” could tele there.
if you would like to turn this into a mod+ command just change donator to player rights == 1 or player rights == 2 or for owner player rights == 3

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a basic donar command
